Developed a sign language recognition system using Python, OpenCV, and TensorFlow for real-time gesture detection and classification via webcam. Trained a CNN model on datasets like ASL Alphabet and Sign Language MNIST to achieve high classification accuracy. AUTOMATED ANDROID MALWARE DETECTION Feb 2025 - present About project Analyze APK files using static features (like permissions, intents, activities, and API calls). • Evaluate and compare the performance of multiple algorithms: Random Forest (RF), Extra Trees (ET), Artificial Neural Networks (ANN), and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). • Combine these models using ensemble learning techniques to create a robust hybrid system that benefits from the strengths of individual classifiers..
